import Badge from '@site/src/components/badges/badges';
import TemplateCard from '@site/src/components/templateCard/templateCard';

<TemplateCard
  fields={12}
  collected={12}
  targetTables={['STAFF_STUDENT_SUBTEST']}
  dependencies={[
    { label: 'Student', link: '/docs/templates/student' },
    { label: 'Staff', link: '/docs/templates/staff' }
  ]}
/>

## Template Description

The Staff Student Subtest Template for Act 13 Educator Effectiveness contains a record for each teacher/student instructional relationship for each assessment. The Staff Student Subtest Template for Act 13 Educator Effectiveness must be submitted in a cumulative fashion indicating all instructional relationships related to PSSA and Keystone Assessments for the school year.

## Template Specifications {#template-specs}

---
### 1 - SUBMITTING AUN
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={9} /></p>

The unique, 9-digit AUN assigned by the PDE.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

All LEA and School Numbers can be found on the [EdNA website](http://www.edna.pa.gov/Screens/wfHome.aspx).

Example: `123456789`
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `STAFF DISTRICT CODE`

---
### 2 - PPID
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={12} /></p>

A unique identifier assigned by the PDE to each staff member reported in PIMS.

Use the 7-digit Professional Personnel ID (PPID) for all certificated and non-certificated staff with direct instructional responsibility for students.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

Do not use leading zeros or spaces in PPIDs.

Example: `3456789`
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `STAFF ID`

---
### 3 - STUDENT AUN
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={9} /></p>

The unique, 9-digit AUN assigned by the PDE.

Use the AUN(s) of the LEA(s) in which the student is enrolled while participating in the course/grade/subject of instruction.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

All LEA and School Numbers can be found on the [EdNA website](http://www.edna.pa.gov/Screens/wfHome.aspx).

Example: `123456789`
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `STUDENT DISTRICT CODE`

---
### 4 - PASECUREID
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={12} /></p>

The unique, 10-digit identifier (PAsecureID) assigned by PDE to each student.

Create a record for each PAsecureID, indicating all students for whom staff have direct instructional responsibility for the applicable course/grade/subject of instruction.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

Example: `1000000009`
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `STUDENT ID`

---
### 5 - SCHOOL YEAR DATE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={10} /></p>

A single date (June 30), the last day of the current school year indicating the whole school year.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

Example: `2025-06-30`
</details>

---
### 6 - ASSESSMENT AUN
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={9} /></p>

The unique, 9-digit AUN assigned by the PDE.

Use the AUN for the state.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

Valid Value: `999999999`
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `ASSESSMENT DISTRICT CODE`

---
### 7 - TEST DESCRIPTION
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={7} /></p>

The unique code that represents the assessment for which this teacher is assigned instructional responsibility.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

See Appendix AK in Volume 2 of the PIMS User Manual for a complete list of valid values.
</details>

---
### 8 - ASSESSMENT SCHOOL YEAR DATE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={10} /></p>

A single date indicating the whole school year; June 30 at the end of the standard school year is used to designate the Assessment school year.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

Example: `2025-06-30`
</details>

---
### 9 - SUBTEST IDENTIFIER
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={8} /></p>

The unique code that represents the more specific subtest for which this teacher is assigned instructional responsibility.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

See Appendix AK in Volume 2 of the PIMS User Manual for a complete list of valid values.
</details>

---
### 10 - PERCENTAGE OF SHARED INSTRUCTION (INSTRUCTIONAL RESPONSIBILITY WEIGHT)
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="updateable" /> <Badge length={3} /></p>

The percentage of content-specific instruction for a state assessment that a teacher is responsible for providing to an individual student. The PERCENTAGE OF SHARED INSTRUCTION (INSTRUCTIONAL RESPONSIBILITY WEIGHT) will account for shared instruction of a student from Day One of the instruction (subject/grade/course) for the state assessment, up to and including the last school day before the LEA's testing window opens for that state assessment.

Zero will add the students to the "removed from roster". 1-100 will add the students to the teacher's roster.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

Whole number from 0 to and including 100.

Example: `50`
</details>

---
### 11 - PERCENTAGE OF CONCURRENT ENROLLMENT (INSTRUCTIONAL RELATIONSHIP WEIGHT)
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="updateable" /> <Badge length={3} /></p>

The percentage of days in which a student and a teacher are enrolled together (concurrently enrolled) for instruction for a state assessment, from Day One of the instruction (subject/grade/course) for the state assessment, up to and including the last school day before the LEA's testing window opens for that state assessment.

Zero will add the students to the "removed from roster." 1-100 will add the students to the teacher's roster.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

Whole number from 0 to and including 100.

Example: `25`
</details>

---
### 12 - RELATIONSHIP SCHOOL NUMBER
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={4} /></p>

The PDE defined, 4-digit code associated with the instructional relationship being reported.

NOTE: Each record represents a relationship, not a teacher or student.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

RELATIONSHIP SCHOOL NUMBER must be related to the matching Field 1 (SUBMITTING AUN) in EdNA.

Example: `1010`
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `RELATIONSHIP LOCATION CODE`

## Rules
See the Rules Section of the Template Domain for rules consistent throughout all templates
